title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2019 Bitcoin Penny, silver 1/4oz x2*Will work on a LIFO system. Bid on the number of coins and then your bid per coin: 1 @ xx btc, 2 @ xx btcLOT 2: 2014 Silver Wallets Series 1 DIY, silver 1oz*Comes with 2x official Silver Wallets hologramsLOT 3: 2018? YPS "B" logo, silver 2.5ozLOT 4: 2021 Niue "B" logo 1.3mbtc, silver 1ozSTARTING BID PER COIN LOT 1: 0.0003BTCSTARTING BID LOT 2: 0.0011BTCSTARTING BID LOT 3: 0.0026BTCSTARTING BID LOT 4: 0.0011BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 6th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
